oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SP4 Christopher Ammons receiving a Purple Heart

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SP4 Christopher Ammons is pictured receiving the Purple Heart for his combat injury. Ammons, left, wears the medal on his uniform and smiles as the officer shakes his hand. All four men in the picture are wearing combat helmets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Men; Medals; Military decorations; Awards
Ammons, Christopher D., 1948- ; Vietnam War, 1961-1975; United States. Army. Infantry Division, 1st; United States -- Army -- Medals, badges, decorations, etc.; Purple Heart
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Christopher Ammons was born in Norfolk, Virginia, on April 18, 1948. He enlisted in the Army on June 1, 1967, and served with the 1st Infantry Division and later with the 194th Military Police Company. He served two tours in Vietnam, 1967-1968 and 1969-1970. His photographs show details of the daily life of soldiers in Vietnam.
